info.title: Product Information
info.description: Documentation of the 1NCE API for Product Information

get.description: Get a list of all avaliable products.

Charge.title: Charge
Charge.description: Charging price for a product or service offered by 1NCE.

id.description: Product id, unique identifier for the product.

package_size.description: Quanitity of product in one package.

minQuantity.description: Minimum quantity of product per order.

maxQuantity.description: Maximum quantity of product per order.

maxQuantityPerCustomer.description: Maximum quantity of product per customer.

min_contract_duration.description: Minimum contract duration for the given product in months.

one_time_charges.description: One-Time charges that apply for this product.

recurring_charges.description: Recurring chargesthat apply for this product.

BearerAuthentication.description: Bearer Authentication Token used to gain access to the 1NCE API. Please refer to the Open Authorization (/oauth/token) request for obtaining a Bearer Token.
